citeinfo.origin: Sharon L. Smith and Peter V.Z. Lane
citeinfo.title: PROBES: Zooplankton of the Southeastern Bering Sea Shelf, 1980 and 1981

descript.abstract: Southeastern Bering Sea shelf and slope. Counts of individuals and life stages for all major taxa of zooplankton covering spring, summer and autumn. Data are depth-stratified and extend to 1200 meters.
descript.purpose: PROBES investigated the food web of the Bering Sea shelf to determine the physical chemical and biological reasons why pollock fisheries and crab fisheries are located in particular portions of the Bering Sea.

idinfo.useconst: Acknowledge data collected by grant from NSF. Acknowledge prior publications.
